channel.title: How to make hidden admins not lose items
channel.description: My server has it so owners and admins don't lose items. But how do i make it so Hidden admins don't lose items? It's a delta 474.

item.title: How to make hidden admins not lose items
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

i agree with watch n lern! my 317 was set to item drop in death for hidden! then i moved to 525 and then now currenty running a 508!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make hidden admins not lose items

item.title: How to make hidden admins not lose items
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

if you make a “hidden” staff member lose items there is no point in being hidden. it would be a dead give away that they are staff and that defeats the purpose of “hidden”.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make hidden admins not lose items
